title: New Scam Technique by Flipkart( youtube link given).
selftext:
Watch the youtube video everything is explained
- https://youtu.be/tOSwZQfL_hc?si=pPz5-yh0NljyGN4_
So I bought Oneplus 9 from flipkart on 22/9/23 but turns out that the mobile is refurbished and out of warranty( I have the Jobsheet from oneplus service centre as a proof plus call recording). I've contacted flipkart numerous times but I have still not got my refund
